rules_text:
Target creature gets +1/+1 until end of turn.
Fabled {2}{RW}{RW} [i](Then if you cast this for its fabled cost, put it onto the battlefield transformed attached to that creature.)[/i]
rules_text2:
Enchant creature
Enchanted creature has “Whenever this creature attacks, attacking creatures you control get +1/+1 until end of turn.”
